targets.query:
from(bucket: "myelectricaldata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "consumption_detail")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Wh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measure_type"] == "HP")
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "myelectricaldata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "consumption_detail")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Wh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measure_type"] == "HC" or r["measure_type"] == "HP")
  |> group(columns: ["measure_type"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> yield(name: "sum")

FinalOutput = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]
RawSeries = from(bucket: "myelectricaldata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "consumption_detail")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "W")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measure_type"] == "HC")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  
       
NamedSeries = RawSeries
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"HC"}))
  |> keep(columns:FinalOutput)

NamedSeries  |> yield(name: "sum")

FinalOutput = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]
RawSeries = from(bucket: "myelectricaldata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "consumption_detail")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "W")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measure_type"] == "HP")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  
       
NamedSeries = RawSeries
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"HP"}))
  |> keep(columns:FinalOutput)

NamedSeries  |> yield(name: "sum")

FinalOutput = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]
RawSeries = from(bucket: "home_assistant_db")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "℃")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "temperature_exterieur_temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
       
NamedSeries = RawSeries
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Temp. Ext."}))
  |> keep(columns:FinalOutput)

NamedSeries  |> yield(name: "mean")

FinalOutput = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]
RawSeries = from(bucket: "home_assistant_db")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "°C" or r["_measurement"] == "℃")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "sensor.temp_exterieure_moyenne")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
NamedSeries = RawSeries
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Temp. Ext."}))
  |> keep(columns:FinalOutput)
NamedSeries |> yield()

panels.title: Puissance consommée - en kW - 7 derniers jours

  |> range(start: -12mo)

import "math"
from(bucket: "myelectricaldata")
  |> range(start: -12mo)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "consumption")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Wh")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> yield(name: "sum")

import "date"
year_to_study = string(v: date.year(t: -1d))
from(bucket: "myelectricaldata")
  |> range(start: 1990-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "consumption")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["year"] == year_to_study)
  |> group(columns: ["year"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> yield()

year_to_study = string(v: date.year(t: -1d))

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "price")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["year"] == year_to_study)
  |> group(columns: ["year"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> yield()

RawSeries = from(bucket: "myelectricaldata")
  |> range(start: 1990-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: now())

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["year"] == string(v: date.year(t: -1d)))
  |> group(columns: ["year"])

NamedSeries = RawSeries
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"current"}))

NamedSeries  |> yield()

from(bucket: "myelectricaldata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "consumption_detail")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "W")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group()

panels.title: Puissance consommée - en kW - 12 derniers mois

targets.query:
FinalOutput = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]
RawSeries = from(bucket: "myelectricaldata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "consumption")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Wh")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
NamedSeries = RawSeries
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Total"}))
  |> keep(columns:FinalOutput)
NamedSeries  |> yield()

FinalOutput = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]
RawSeries = from(bucket: "myelectricaldata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "consumption_detail")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measure_type"] == "HC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Wh")
  |> timeShift(duration: -1d)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
NamedSeries = RawSeries
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"HC"}))
  |> keep(columns:FinalOutput)
NamedSeries  |> yield()

FinalOutput = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]
RawSeries = from(bucket: "myelectricaldata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "consumption_detail")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measure_type"] == "HP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Wh")
  |> timeShift(duration: -1d)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
NamedSeries = RawSeries
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"HP"}))
  |> keep(columns:FinalOutput)
NamedSeries  |> yield()

FinalOutput = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]
RawSeries = from(bucket: "home_assistant_db")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "°C" or r["_measurement"] == "℃")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "temperature_exterieur_temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
NamedSeries = RawSeries
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Temp. Ext."}))
  |> keep(columns:FinalOutput)
NamedSeries |> yield()

FinalOutput = ["_field", "_time", "_value"]
RawSeries = from(bucket: "home_assistant_db")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "°C" or r["_measurement"] == "℃")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "temp_interieure_moyenne")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
NamedSeries = RawSeries
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Temp. Int."}))
  |> keep(columns:FinalOutput)
NamedSeries |> yield()
